Getting Started Features Commands Plugins API
M

Advanced Terminal Emulator

Built in Rust with Python integration. A comprehensive command-line experience for modern developers with 200+ commands, plugin system, and advanced features.

Get Started View on GitHub

Powerful Features

Everything you need for a modern terminal experience

200+ Commands

Comprehensive command library covering file operations, system administration, networking, and more.

Plugin System

Extensible plugin architecture for custom commands and functionality.

High Performance

Built with Rust for blazing fast performance and memory safety.

Python Integration

Seamless Python script execution and interactive Python sessions.

Customizable

Highly configurable with themes, aliases, and custom settings.

Cross-Platform

Works seamlessly on Windows, macOS, and Linux.

Get Started in Minutes

Install and start using Macbrew with just a few commands

Install with npx (Recommended)

npx macbrew

Or install globally

npm install -g macbrew

Start using

macbrew
View full installation guide →
